languages.text: Род Версериан был обвинен в предательстве. Сенешаль Абеляр от лица своей семьи попросил о личном вмешательстве Вольного Торговца — в надежде, что истина, какова бы она ни была, будет раскрыта.

traits.locale_text: Помогите Абеляру разобрать клубок запутанных интриг на Даргонусе.

languages.text: House Werserian stands accused of treason. On behalf of his family, Abelard has asked the Rogue Trader to intervene in this matter in hopes that the truth may be revealed — whatever it turns out to be.
languages.original_text: Род Версериан был обвинен в предательстве. Сенешаль Абеляр от лица своей семьи попросил о личном вмешательстве Вольного Торговца — в надежде, что истина, какова бы она ни была, будет раскрыта.

traits.locale_text: House Werserian stands accused of treason. On behalf of his family, Abelard has asked the Rogue Trader to intervene in this matter in hopes that the truth may be revealed — whatever it turns out to be.

House Werserian stands accused of treason. On behalf of his family, Abelard has asked the Rogue Trader to intervene in this matter in hopes that the truth may be revealed — whatever it turns out to be.

languages.text: Das Haus Werserian wird des Verrats beschuldigt. Im Namen seiner Familie hat Abelard {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} um Intervention gebeten, weil er hofft, dass dann die Wahrheit ans Licht kommt – wie auch immer sie aussehen mag.
languages.original_text: House Werserian stands accused of treason. On behalf of his family, Abelard has asked the Rogue Trader to intervene in this matter in hopes that the truth may be revealed — whatever it turns out to be.

traits.locale_text: Das Haus Werserian wird des Verrats beschuldigt. Im Namen seiner Familie hat Abelard {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} um Intervention gebeten, weil er hofft, dass dann die Wahrheit ans Licht kommt – wie auch immer sie aussehen mag.

languages.text: La maison Werserian est accusée de trahison. Au nom de sa famille, Abélard a demandé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} d'intervenir en sa faveur dans l'espoir que la vérité soit révélée, quelle qu'elle soit.
languages.original_text: House Werserian stands accused of treason. On behalf of his family, Abelard has asked the Rogue Trader to intervene in this matter in hopes that the truth may be revealed — whatever it turns out to be.

traits.locale_text: La maison Werserian est accusée de trahison. Au nom de sa famille, Abélard a demandé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} d'intervenir en sa faveur dans l'espoir que la vérité soit révélée, quelle qu'elle soit.

languages.text: ウェルザリアン家が反逆罪に問われている。どんな事情が暴かれるとしても、真実が明らかになることを望むアベラルドは、一族を代表して自由開拓者にこの問題への介入を依頼した。
languages.original_text: House Werserian stands accused of treason. On behalf of his family, Abelard has asked the Rogue Trader to intervene in this matter in hopes that the truth may be revealed — whatever it turns out to be.

traits.locale_text: ウェルザリアン家が反逆罪に問われている。どんな事情が暴かれるとしても、真実が明らかになることを望むアベラルドは、一族を代表して自由開拓者にこの問題への介入を依頼した。

languages.text: La casa Werserian está acusada de traición. En nombre de su familia, Abelard pide a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que intervenga en el asunto para desvelar la verdad... sea cual sea.
languages.original_text: House Werserian stands accused of treason. On behalf of his family, Abelard has asked the Rogue Trader to intervene in this matter in hopes that the truth may be revealed — whatever it turns out to be.

traits.locale_text: La casa Werserian está acusada de traición. En nombre de su familia, Abelard pide a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que intervenga en el asunto para desvelar la verdad... sea cual sea.

languages.text: 韦尔森家族被指控犯下了叛国罪。为了自己的家人，阿贝拉德请求行商浪人调查这件事情，揭露最终的真相——无论真相究竟如何。
languages.original_text: House Werserian stands accused of treason. On behalf of his family, Abelard has asked the Rogue Trader to intervene in this matter in hopes that the truth may be revealed — whatever it turns out to be.

traits.locale_text: 韦尔森家族被指控犯下了叛国罪。为了自己的家人，阿贝拉德请求行商浪人调查这件事情，揭露最终的真相——无论真相究竟如何。

languages.text: Werserian Hanesi ihanetten suçlanıyor. Abelard, hakikat ne olursa olsun onu ortaya çıkarmak amacıyla ailesinin adına Hür Tacir'den bu meseleye el atmasını talep etti.
languages.original_text: House Werserian stands accused of treason. On behalf of his family, Abelard has asked the Rogue Trader to intervene in this matter in hopes that the truth may be revealed — whatever it turns out to be.
